data.title: TLC: Tidally Locked Coordinates
data.name: tidally-locked-coordinates
data.description: Scripts for transforming GCM output into a tidally locked coordinate system.

evidence: "Convert GCM output from standard/Earth-like coordinates into a tidally locked coordinate system. These transformations are useful for plotting and analyzing global climate model (GCM) simulations" (indicates a domain-specific analysis tool, i.e., application software used directly in research).

"They can be used to leverage the fact that a slowly rotating planet's climate will start to look approximately symmetric about the axis of insolation." (shows direct role in producing/transforming scientific analysis results).
README only shows code, figures, and attribution ("Original code by dkoll"), with no mention of package managers, binaries, or hosted services, implying distribution via the source repository.
